name: Jeeva 2.0
tagline: Superhuman Sales, Powered By Agentic AI
description: From lead discovery to enrichment to personalized outreach, Jeeva handles it all so you can focus on closing, not chasing. With 2.0, Jeeva now sorts your inbox, preps you instantly for every call, manages your follow-ups, and even takes notes for you.

name: Levio by Jupitrr AI
tagline: Your AI video editing agent
description: Levio is your AI Video editing Agent that makes finetuning your videos as easy as chatting with ChatGPT. No editing skills or complex timelines needed, just attention grabbing personal branding videos in minutes.

name: Trae 2.0
tagline: SOLO: Context Engineer that delivers software end-to-end
description: Trae 2.0 brings SOLO to everyone, which is your all-in-one Context Engineer that doesn‚Äôt just assist with code, but thinks, plans, builds, and ships complete features end-to-end, with the right information and tools.

name: the gist of
tagline: Go beyond the link in bio. Tell a story.
description: Share with the world the gist of who you are with the simplest, most beautiful, minimalistic personal site you can create in minutes. We are sure you have an amazing story to tell.

name: Krepling Pay
tagline: Boost sales with one-click checkout, no account required
description: Krepling Pay is a white-labeled, platform-agnostic checkout engine that lets customers complete purchases in one click‚Äîno login or account needed. Reduce friction, build trust, and boost repeat sales with a fully branded, optimized flow.

name: Stakpak.dev
tagline: Open-source DevOps agent to secure & manage production infra
description: Stakpak.dev is an Open-source DevOps agent written in Rust, helps you secure, deploy, and maintain production-ready infrastructure. Try it now: curl -sSL https://stakpak.dev/install.sh | sh

name: sampleapp.ai
tagline: Self-serve API & SDK onboarding‚Äîin 60 seconds. Skip docs.
description: Nobody likes reading docs. Sampleapp.ai turns your API into interactive, live sandboxes‚Äîso developers get a working app and onboard in under 60 seconds. Used by leading unicorn, series A/B/C and high growth startups.

name: Refgrow
tagline: Grow with referrals on autopilot
description: Add an affiliate program to your product in minutes. Attract affiliates and get customers automatically right inside your app.

name: Veo 3 API
tagline: Generate videos (with audio) using Veo 3 from Google
description: Veo 3 is now available for scaled developer use in the Gemini API, with both audio generation and no audio generation as model options.

name: Brainfork
tagline: Own your AI knowledge | Personal MCP server
description: Brainfork is a personal knowledge and decision MCP server that allows you to regain control of your knowledge and maximise the possibility of a personal RAG service.

name: Submagic API
tagline: Automate video editing with Submagic API
description: Automate your video editing workflow with Submagic API. Generate videos with Captions, B-roll, Zooms.. and more ‚Äî in one API call, or via n8n & Zapier üöÄ

name: Rubbrband
tagline: Create storyboards from scripts
description: Transform scripts into storyboards instantly with Rubbrband's AI storyboard generator. Perfect for filmmakers, content creators, and video production teams.

name: Saidar 2.0
tagline: Your Personal AI Secretary for Admin Tasks
description: Automate your tasks using Saidar, a personal assistant that uses your favorite softwares, like Gmail, Notion, Docs, and many more! Setup automations, generate reports, transfer data, and so much more... Just ask!

name: Palmier
tagline: Agents that write prod-ready code. Automatically.
description: Palmier is a powerful autonomous AI software engineering assistant that works asynchronously across tasks: write features, fix bugs, review PRs, triage issues, and more, integrated into your stack with full codebase context.

name: FullStro 2.0
tagline: A multi-channel e-commerce automation in one dashboard
description: Launching FullStro 2.0, a multi-channel eCommerce automation system. Build your website, manage multichannel orders, sync inventory, automate shipping, returns & refunds, integrate payments, manage suppliers, reports & analytics & many more, all in one place.

name: Corner Time
tagline: macOS clock for fullscreen or whenever the menubar is hidden
description: Corner Time is a macOS native-like clock that stays visible when you enter fullscreen mode or hide the menu bar.

name: ComfyUI-Copilot
tagline: Build ComfyUI workflows with natural language
description: ComfyUI-Copilot is an open-source AI assistant from Alibaba that simplifies ComfyUI. Use natural language to get node suggestions, build workflows, and explore parameters. Integrates directly into the UI.

name: earwink‚Ñ¢
tagline: Social media platform for voice messages - fast and easy!
description: This will never take off! All my life, I've tried to create and launch ideas that are different, edgy, creative, innovative or fresh in some way. But I've noticed that often, these ideas don't get picked up by a mainstream audience. Will this boring one stick?

name: HyperFetch 7.0.0
tagline: Integrate with any API
description: New release of the API management framework. Highlights: ‚Ä¢ New DevTools ü™Ñ ‚Ä¢ Generate SDKs üîå ‚Ä¢ Powerful CLI ‚úÖ ‚Ä¢ New Docs üìö ‚Ä¢ Plugins system üåê ‚Ä¢ New Sockets üöÄ HyperFetch dramatically simplifies app maintenance. Don‚Äôt fall behind. Choose HyperFetch.

name: Quip
tagline: AI-powered clipboard history, text expansion, and much more
description: Quip is a rethought clipboard manager built for speed, privacy, and productivity. Search, filter, and sync everything you copy. Use Super Shortcuts to paste anywhere. Clean your clipboard with on-device AI. Built to be used across Mac, iPhone & iPad.
